definition: to gush forth (as water), generally to issue
kjvTranslation: break forth, labor to bring forth, come forth, draw up, take out.

translations.bg: да извира (като вода), като цяло да излиза
translations.da: at strømme ud (som vand), generelt at komme ud
translations.el: να αναβλύζει (όπως το νερό), γενικά να εκπέμπει
translations.es: brotar (como el agua), en general, salir a borbotones
translations.id: memancar keluar (seperti air), umumnya untuk mengeluarkan
translations.ja: 水が湧き出る、一般に水が出る
translations.nb: å strømme ut (som vann), generelt å komme ut
translations.nl: spuiten (als water), in het algemeen uitgeven
translations.ro: a țâșni afară (ca apa), în general a ieși
translations.sv: att spruta fram (som vatten), i allmänhet att ge ut
